page.title: 04INDUSTRY ON E. BANK OF TAFF
page.content: Most of the industry in the area is situated on the East bank of{The River {Taff.}The river itself is not used for any industrial purpose. Its banks were built up in 1982/83 to prevent flooding. There are several industries in this area{(184754).} {a) Curran Road Cash and Carry. This is the most popular in Cardiff. All the wines here are from France, Germany, Spain and Italy. They deliver wines all over Wales and England. {b) Hoskings. This a private club which is open every day except Sunday. {c) Joinery Division. This makes windows, doors and staircases; and are bar and shop fitting specialists. {d) B.P. Mechanical}- repair forklift trucks.
